urls.description: ‚ÄòWe have been left with headaches, lethargy, nausea and have stinging eyes from the intense stench that fills our homes‚Äô

@Tus_M_ @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA As an update @ClareDinnisEA I'm now on day 5 of streaming eyes, they don't stop watering and are sore all the time, managed to get 5hrs sleep last night rather than the usual 3 but the gas is now seeping in again tonight - can we swap houses for a bit so you can see how it feels?

The whole town seems to be engulfed by it, what on earth is happening? Do the @EnvAgency need to be called out as an emergency @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC ? Total loss of control @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/0nmjXA9mHi

urls.title: Residents complaining of headaches and nausea from nearby landfill stench | ITV News
urls.description: A gas called hydrogen sulphide emanates from Walleys Quarry in¬†Newcastle-under-Lyme. Thousands have reported the "nauseating" fumes to the Environment Agency.
